content:
Please generate a random creature card for a mythical bestiary. Attributes to populate:

Creature Name: The name of the beast.
Habitat: Where the creature typically resides.
Size: The approximate size of the creature.
Diet: What the creature eats.
Special Ability: Any unique skills or powers the creature may have.

Creature Name: Quill Drake

Habitat: Mountainous regions with dense forests

Size: Wingspan of 15 feet, body length of 10 feet

Diet: Carnivorous, primarily preys on large mammals and other dragons

Special Ability: Quill projection - the ability to launch sharp quills from its body as projectiles.
